content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Emilia Müller from Germany. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Munich. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content:
Hello Emilia Müller, it's great to meet you. Thank you for showing interest in my apartment. I understand that you are looking for a place to live in Munich and my apartment could be a great option for you.

As for the rental price, I am open to discussing it with you. However, I must clarify that my goal is to maximize my gains from renting out my apartment. That being said, I am willing to negotiate with you to find a mutually beneficial arrangement.

What rental price are you looking for?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
450€ per month.

I want to rent the apartment for the lowest possible price.

I want to be on good terms with my landlord.

I want to negotiate the rental price.

I agree to the price of 450€ per month.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content:
Hello Emilia Müller,

Thank you for your response. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate and find a mutually beneficial arrangement. I can agree to the rental price of 450€ per month.

I understand that you are looking for the lowest possible price, and I am willing to work with you to find a solution that meets both our needs. I am open to discussing any additional terms or conditions that you may have in mind.

I look forward to working with you and building a positive relationship as your landlord. If you have any further questions or concerns, please don't hesitate to reach out to me.
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
Hi Mister Heine. I just want to say thank you for considering me for the rental of your apartment. I am really excited to move in and start my new life in Munich. I hope we can continue to have a good relationship.

Thank you again for everything.

Best regards,

Emilia Müller
